name: isree-auth-service
description: Auth Service for all of sree's projects

scripts.genCertsDev: rm -rf src/certs && mkdir src/certs && openssl genrsa -out src/certs/access_private.pem 1024 && openssl rsa -in src/certs/access_private.pem -pubout -out src/certs/access_public.pem && openssl genrsa -out src/certs/refresh_private.pem 2048 && openssl rsa -in src/certs/refresh_private.pem -pubout -out src/certs/refresh_public.pem
scripts.genCerts: rm -rf build/certs && mkdir build && mkdir build/certs && openssl genrsa -out build/certs/access_private.pem 1024 && openssl rsa -in build/certs/access_private.pem -pubout -out build/certs/access_public.pem && openssl genrsa -out build/certs/refresh_private.pem 2048 && openssl rsa -in build/certs/refresh_private.pem -pubout -out build/certs/refresh_public.pem
scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run genCerts && tsc

author: Sree
